rewrite1: Begin by changing the font of the chosen section to Arial. Next, use the highlight feature to color the text with the hex code #FF00FF. Then, set the right margin to an indentation of 1 cm. Ensure that the line spacing is adjusted to a single line. Create a negative indent on the left side of 15 points. Finally, make sure the text is aligned to justify.
